channel.title: obsidian projects on Nicole van der Hoeven
channel.description: Recent content in obsidian projects on Nicole van der Hoeven

item.title: Notion-like Content Calendar in Obsidian Projects
item.description:
If you’re looking to create a content calendar in Obsidian just like in Notion, the new Obsidian Projects plugin presents new options for managing content using multiple views: Table, Board, Calendar, and Gallery to start with, but hopefully more in the future. Projects is a framework for creating new views for the same data and aims to play well with other plugins.

Related

  • üé• Notion database views in Obsidian Projects plugin (Livestream with the Projects plugin developer, Marcus Olsson)

item.title: Notion Database Views in Obsidian (Live)
item.description:
Have you ever wanted rotating Notion database views in Obsidian? Marcus Olsson’s Obsidian Projects plugin does exactly that, letting you create Table, Board, Calendar, and Gallery views for the same notes in Obsidian, just like in Notion! Join us as Marcus shows us how this awesome new plugin works and how it can be used to display the same data in different ways.

Resources

  • Marcus’s post on the plugin
  • The Obsidian Projects GitHub repo
  • The Projects roadmap
  • My video on the old way to create a Content Calendar in Obsidian
